title: Love Island contestants called out over social media ads
description: Anna Vakili, Belle Hassan and Francesca Allen are named and shamed by the advertising watchdog.

title: New laws to tackle misleading crypto-asset adverts
description: The government is worried some consumers may not understand what they are buying.

title: Microsoft plans to buy Call of Duty company Activision Blizzard for nearly $70bn
description: It's the biggest deal in gaming history, bringing some of the world's most popular titles to Game Pass.

title: Aldi opens its first till-free supermarket
description: The supermarket will bill people after they leave the store as part of a trial using new technology.

title: US airlines warn of impending 5G flight disruption
description: Airlines say the start of 5G mobile phone services on Wednesday will hit aircraft navigation systems.

title: New campaign aims to stop more encrypted apps
description: No Place to Hide says end-to-end encryption makes it harder to detect child abuse.

title: How Nigeria succeeded in clipping Twitter's wings
description: Some fear that Twitter agreeing to new rules in Nigeria may encourage others to restrict social media.
